nodes.text: Boegis Squadron was a Y-wing squadron commanded by Nami Crime Lord Ali Tarrak.

The Squadron was used by Tarrak to disable 3 Imperial Modified corvettes called Hashim. After disabling them, a Corellian transport, Dhoora boarded and captured Hashim 1, which contained a TIE Defender prototype, while Boegis along with T-wings from Talon Squadron, provided cover and escort.

The squadron was used again to try to kidnap the Chief scientist when the Imperials defeated the Rneekii Pirates. This time the attempt was unsuccessful and the Y-wings, along with T-wings from Oro Squadron were destroyed and the transport Choora was captured.
